Posts.EditableText:
When creating a description for a page using GameBook, there are some options on the right side of the description page, one of these is the option page.
Can someone please tell me how to use this option 'Page'.
In the help it says:
page:command}
As command (an alternative name that may be preferred for game books).
{page:command:text}
As command (an alternative name that may be preferred for game books). 

But I don't know exactly what that means.
An example would be helpful thanks.

Posts.EditableText:
I have now worked out how to use the Page option.
I can't find anyway of removing my question from this forum.
Posts.HTML:
I have now worked out how to use the Page option.

Posts.EditableText:
I think most would know except beginners.

Using GameBook I click on "page" on the right of the description screen.
It prompts me to type in the word(s) I want to appear as a link and then I select what location I want the user to jump to when he clicks on the link, from a drop down menu.
The result is:
{page:Page2:This is a test}

The result is:
